    public interface Racetrack
extends Landscape
    Simulation access for the race track.

      • getStartAndFinishLineBegin

        Vector getStartAndFinishLineBegin()
        The start-and-finish line that this function returns, spans the entire width of the road (only the asphalt part).
        Returns:
        the absolute coordinate of one end of the start-finish line.

      • getStartAndFinishLineEnd

        Vector getStartAndFinishLineEnd()
        The start-and-finish line that this function returns, spans the entire width of the road (only the asphalt part).
        Returns:
        the absolute coordinate of one end of the start-finish line.
